title: Elementwise intersection (families of sets induced on a subset)
content: Many kinds of structures are given by families of subsets of a given set: Moore collections ( ~ df-mre ), topologies ( ~ df-top ), pi-systems, rings of sets, delta-rings, lambda-systems/Dynkin systems, algebras/fields of sets, sigma-algebras/sigma-fields/tribes ( ~ df-siga ), sigma rings, monotone classes, matroids/independent sets, bornologies, filters. There is a natural notion of structure induced on a subset. It is often given by an elementwise intersection, namely, the family of intersections of sets in the original family with the given subset. In this subsection, we define this notion and prove its main properties. Classical conditions on families of subsets include being nonempty, containing the whole set, containing the empty set, being stable under unions, intersections, subsets, supersets, (relative) complements. Therefore, we prove related properties for the elementwise intersection. We will call ` ( X |``t A ) ` the elementwise intersection on the family ` X ` by the class ` A ` . REMARK: many theorems are already in set.mm ; MM> SEARCH *rest* / JOIN

blocks.name: bj-rest00
blocks.content: An elementwise intersection on the empty family is the empty set. TODO: this is ~ 0rest . (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: bj-restsn
blocks.content: An elementwise intersection on the singleton on a set is the singleton on the intersection by that set. Generalization of ~ bj-restsn0 and ~ bj-restsnid . (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-restsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(csn(c0), crest, c2), csn(cin(c0, c2))))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(csn(c0), crest, c2), csn(cin(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  sylan9bbr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), co(csn(c0), crest, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cin(c0, c2))), wrex(hs1, csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2))))
  mpan(wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(csn(c0), crest, c2)), wrex(hs1, csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))), wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  snex(c0)
  elrest(hs1, csn(c0), universe, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  rexsng(hs1, c0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cin(c0, c2))))
  syl5bbr(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cin(c0, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cin(cv(hs1), c2))))
  velsn(hs0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), csn(cin(cv(hs1), c2)), csn(cin(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  sneqd(cin(cv(hs1), c2), cin(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs1), c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(csn(c0), crest, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cin(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cin(c0, c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-restsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→({ c0 }[|`t]c2)= {(c0 ⋂ c2)})
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, ({ c0 }[|`t]c2), {(c0 ⋂ c2)}, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  sylan9bbr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, hs0 ∈({ c0 }[|`t]c2), hs0 ∈ {(c0 ⋂ c2)}, ∃(hs1 ∈ { c0 }, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c2)))
  mpan(c2 ∈ c3, (hs0 ∈({ c0 }[|`t]c2)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ { c0 }, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c2))), { c0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c0)
  elrest(hs1, { c0 }, universe, c2, c3, hs0)
  rexsng(hs1, c0, c1, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c2), hs0 ∈ {(c0 ⋂ c2)})
  syl5bbr(hs1 = c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c2), hs0 ∈ {(c0 ⋂ c2)}, hs0 ∈ {(hs1 ⋂ c2)})
  velsn(hs0, (hs1 ⋂ c2))
  eleq2d(hs0, {(hs1 ⋂ c2)}, {(c0 ⋂ c2)}, hs1 = c0)
  sneqd((hs1 ⋂ c2), (c0 ⋂ c2), hs1 = c0)
  ineq1(hs1, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(({ c0 }[|`t]c2))
  diff.hs0.c({(c0 ⋂ c2)})
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  diff.hs1.c({ c0 })
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ {(c0 ⋂ c2)})
}

blocks.name: bj-restsnid
blocks.content: The elementwise intersection on the singleton on a class by that class is the singleton on that class. Special case of ~ bj-restsn and ~ bj-restsnss . (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-restsnid(class c0) {
  |- wceq(co(csn(c0), crest, c0), csn(c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(co(csn(c0), crest, c0), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(co(csn(c0), crest, c0), csn(c0)), wss(c0, c0))
  ssid(c0)
  bj-restsnss(c0, universe, c0)
  eqtr4d(co(csn(c0), crest, c0), csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  ovprc2(c0, csn(c0), crest)
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, crest, universe, universe, crn(cmpt(hs2, cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))))
  df-rest(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-restsnid(class c0) {
  ⊢ ({ c0 }[|`t]c0)= { c0 }
} = {
  pm2.61i(({ c0 }[|`t]c0)= { c0 }, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ({ c0 }[|`t]c0)= { c0 }, c0 ⊆ c0)
  ssid(c0)
  bj-restsnss(c0, universe, c0)
  eqtr4d(({ c0 }[|`t]c0), { c0 }, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ovprc2(c0, { c0 }, crest)
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, crest, universe, universe, ran((hs2 ∈ hs0 ↦(hs2 ⋂ hs1))))
  df-rest(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  biimpi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, { c0 } = ∅)
  snprc(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
}

blocks.name: bj-rest10
blocks.content: An elementwise intersection on a nonempty family by the empty set is the singleton on the empty set. TODO: this generalizes ~ rest0 and could replace it. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-rest10(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(co(c0, crest, emptycls), csn(emptycls))))
} = {
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(co(c0, crest, emptycls), csn(emptycls)))
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, crest, emptycls), csn(emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sylan9bb(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), emptycls))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, emptycls)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), emptycls)))), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  elrest(hs1, c0, c1, emptycls, universe, cv(hs0))
  baib(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), emptycls))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  bitri(wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), emptycls))), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  rexbii(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  eqeq2i(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), emptycls), emptycls)
  in0(cv(hs1))
  bitri(wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))))
  df-rex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  bitri(wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wa(wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  19.41v(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  anbi1i(wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls))
  bicomi(wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  n0(hs1, c0)
  velsn(hs0, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, crest, emptycls))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(emptycls))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-rest10(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ≠ ∅ →(c0[|`t]∅)= { ∅ }))
} = {
  ex(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ≠ ∅, (c0[|`t]∅)= { ∅ })
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0[|`t]∅), { ∅ }, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅))
  syl6bbr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), hs0 ∈(c0[|`t]∅), hs0 ∈ { ∅ }, hs0 = ∅)
  sylan9bb(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ≠ ∅, hs0 ∈(c0[|`t]∅), hs0 = ∅, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ ∅)))
  mpan2(c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈(c0[|`t]∅)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ ∅))), ∅ ∈ 𝕌)
  0ex()
  elrest(hs1, c0, c1, emptycls, universe, hs0)
  baib(c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ ∅)), hs0 = ∅)
  bitri(∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ ∅)), (c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 = ∅), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 = ∅))
  rexbii(hs1, c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ ∅), hs0 = ∅)
  eqeq2i(hs0, (hs1 ⋂ ∅), emptycls)
  in0(hs1)
  bitri(∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 = ∅), (c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 = ∅), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = ∅)))
  df-rex(hs1, c0, hs0 = ∅)
  bitri(∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = ∅)), (c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 = ∅), (∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = ∅))
  19.41v(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 = ∅)
  anbi1i(∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0), hs0 = ∅, c0 ≠ ∅)
  bicomi(∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0), c0 ≠ ∅)
  n0(hs1, c0)
  velsn(hs0, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[|`t]∅))
  diff.hs0.c({ ∅ })
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = ∅)
}

thm bj-restn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wne(c0, emptycls), wex(hs0, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  n0(hs1, c0)

  sylib(wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wex(hs0, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))), wrex(hs1, c0, wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))))
  sylibr(wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wrex(hs1, c0, wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2))))))
  eximi(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))))

  biimprd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c2)))
  elrest(hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(hs0))

blocks.pretty:
thm bj-restn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0 ≠ ∅ →(c0[|`t]c2)≠ ∅))
} = {
  syl6ibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c0 ≠ ∅, (c0[|`t]c2)≠ ∅, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[|`t]c2)))
  syld((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[|`t]c2)), ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c2))))
  syl5bi((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c2))), ∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0))
  n0(hs1, c0)
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0)→ ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c2)))))

blocks.name: bj-restpw
blocks.content: The elementwise intersection on a powerset is the powerset of the intersection. This allows to prove for instance that the topology induced on a subset by the discrete topology is the discrete topology on that subset. See also ~ restdis (which uses ~ distop and ~ restopn2 ). (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: bj-restv
blocks.content: An elementwise intersection by a subset on a family containing the whole set contains the whole subset. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: bj-resta
blocks.content: An elementwise intersection by a set on a family containing that set contains that set. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: bj-restuni
blocks.content: The union of an elementwise intersection by a set is equal to the intersection with that set of the union of the family. See also ~ restuni and ~ restuni2 . (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)

thm bj-restuni2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cuni(c0))), wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c2)), c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(cuni(co(c0, crest, c2)), c2, cin(cuni(c0), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cuni(c0))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c2)), cin(cuni(c0), c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylan2(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  ssexg(c2, cuni(c0), universe)
  bj-restuni(c0, c1, c2, universe)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wceq(cin(cuni(c0), c2), c2))
  eqssd(cin(cuni(c0), c2), c2, wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
  a1i(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wss(cin(cuni(c0), c2), c2))
  inss2(cuni(c0), c2)
  ssind(c2, cuni(c0), c2, wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
  id(wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
  ssidd(c2, wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-restuni2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0)→ ⋃(c0[|`t]c2)= c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(⋃(c0[|`t]c2), c2, (⋃ c0 ⋂ c2), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0))
  syldan(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ⋃(c0[|`t]c2)=(⋃ c0 ⋂ c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylan2(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  ssexg(c2, ⋃ c0, universe)
  bj-restuni(c0, c1, c2, universe)
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, (⋃ c0 ⋂ c2)= c2)
  eqssd((⋃ c0 ⋂ c2), c2, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  a1i(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, (⋃ c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c2)
  inss2(⋃ c0, c2)
  ssind(c2, ⋃ c0, c2, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  id(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  ssidd(c2, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
}

blocks.name: bj-restreg
blocks.content: A reformulation of the axiom of regularity using elementwise intersection. (RK: might have to be placed later since theorems in this section are to be moved early (in the section related to the algebra of sets).) (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-restreg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(emptycls, co(c0, crest, c0)))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(emptycls, co(c0, crest, c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), c0))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), c0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c0), emptycls)))
  zfreg(hs0, c0, c1)
  rexbii(hs0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c0), emptycls), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqcom(cin(cv(hs0), c0), emptycls)
  syldan(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wcel(emptycls, co(c0, crest, c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), c0)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls))
  elrest(hs0, c0, c1, c0, c1, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-restreg(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ ∅ ∈(c0[|`t]c0))
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∅ ∈(c0[|`t]c0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∅ =(hs0 ⋂ c0)))
  sylib((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∅ =(hs0 ⋂ c0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ c0)= ∅))
  zfreg(hs0, c0, c1)
  rexbii(hs0, c0, (hs0 ⋂ c0)= ∅, ∅ =(hs0 ⋂ c0))
  eqcom((hs0 ⋂ c0), emptycls)
  syldan(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ≠ ∅, (∅ ∈(c0[|`t]c0)↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∅ =(hs0 ⋂ c0))), c0 ∈ c1)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ≠ ∅)
  elrest(hs0, c0, c1, c0, c1, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
}
